Ability.Description: Increases damage done with area effect abilities by 3%. Increases all Resistances by 3%. Shares a cooldown with Condensed Obliteration and Focused Obliteration.

Rank.Description: Increases the radius of your damaging area effect abilities by 1m.
Increases the radius of your damaging area effect abilities by 2m.
Increases the radius of your damaging area effect abilities by 3m.

Ability.Description: Removes all crowd control effects. Teleports forward 15m.
Increases non-Physical damage taken by 5% on up to 10 enemies. Lasts 30s.

Rank.Description: Increases your damage done with Bound Fate and Tyranny of Death by 3%.
Increases your damage done with Bound Fate and Tyranny of Death by 6%.
Increases your damage done with Bound Fate and Tyranny of Death by 9%.
Your Bound Fate has a 50% chance to spread your Tyranny of Death from the target to each enemy it hits.
Your Bound Fate has a 100% chance to spread your Tyranny of Death from the target to each enemy it hits.

Ability.Description: Pulls up to 8 enemies to the target's location. Snares each enemy hit for 8s.

Increases your Critical Hit chance with Curses and Dark Water by 10%.

Ability.Description: Causes the next hostile spell cast on the ally to be reflected back at the caster. Lasts 10s.

Rank.Description: Increases the effect of Spell Power on your Bound Fate and Disintegration by 15%.
Increases the effect of Spell Power on your Bound Fate and Disintegration by 30%.

Ability.Description: Deals 874 to 965 Death damage to up to 8 enemies. Restores 4% health and mana to the Cleric for each enemy hit. Counts as an Obliteration ability.

Deals 1456 to 1609 Death damage. Restores 15% health and mana. Counts as an Obliteration ability. Requires Focused Obliteration.

Rank.Description: Increases your Death damage by 5%.
Increases your Death damage by 10%.
Increases your Death damage by 15%.

Ability.Description: Applies Reversal of Fortune to all party or raid members. Causes the next hostile spell cast on the ally to be reflected back at the caster. Lasts 10s.
Resets the cooldown on all Sigils. Causes the next 3 Sigils to have no cooldown. Does not affect Sigil of Catastrophe. Lasts 1m.

AbilityRank.Description: Applies Reversal of Fortune to all party or raid members. Causes the next hostile spell cast on the ally to be reflected back at the caster. Lasts 10s.
Grants Stealth while stationary. Restores 2.5% health each second. Lasts 10s. Resets the cooldown of Dark Passage.
Increases non-Physical damage taken by 5% on up to 10 enemies. Lasts 30s.

Deals 874 to 965 Death damage to all enemies near the initial target's location in an expanding ring. After 2.5s, the ring contracts back inwards, dealing the same damage again. Triggers Tyranny of Death.
Restores 5% mana each second over 10s.
Applies all Sigils to up to 10 enemies.

Deals 1930 Death damage over 15s to up to 8 enemies within 7m of the enemy's location at the time Well of Souls is cast. Up to 8 enemies within Well of Souls take an additional 10% damage from the Cleric's Cabalist Curses, Disintegration and Bound Fate for 15s. Only one instance of Well of Souls can be active at a time.
Deals 1379 Death damage to up to 8 enemies. Triggers Tyranny of Death. Counts as an Obliteration ability.
Deals 558 to 617 Death damage to up to 8 enemies after 10s. Triggers early if the enemy dies or is damaged by the Cleric's Tyranny of Death. Counts as an Obliteration ability.

Deals 2299 Death damage, split equally among up to 5 enemies. Total damage is increased by 60% for each additional enemy hit. Triggers Tyranny of Death. Counts as an Obliteration ability. Requires Condensed Obliteration.
Removes all crowd control effects. Teleports forward 15m.
Pulls up to 8 enemies to the target's location. Snares each enemy hit for 8s.
Deals 349 to 386 Death damage to up to 8 enemies. Counts as an Obliteration ability.
Applies Curse of Anarchy for 15s to up to 8 enemies. Deals 68 to 75 Death damage to up to 3 enemies every 1.5s. Counts as an Obliteration ability.
Applies Curse of Solitude for 15s. Deals 218 to 241 Death damage to up to 5 enemies every 1.5s. Can only affect 1 enemy. Counts as an Obliteration ability. Requires Condensed Obliteration.
Deals 2759 Death damage. Triggers Tyranny of Death. Counts as an Obliteration ability. Requires Focused Obliteration.
Deals 1533 Death damage over 15s.
Deals 1456 to 1609 Death damage. Restores 15% health and mana. Counts as an Obliteration ability. Requires Focused Obliteration.
Deals 874 to 965 Death damage to up to 8 enemies. Restores 4% health and mana to the Cleric for each enemy hit. Counts as an Obliteration ability.
Grants immunity to the next Debilitate or Interrupt. Lasts 2m.
Stuns up to 10 enemies for 2s.
Deals 728 to 804 Death damage. Counts as an Obliteration ability. Requires Focused Obliteration.
Deals 970 to 1073 Death damage.

Increases the damage of Shadow's Touch by 25% and causes it to apply a stack of Darkness, dealing Death damage over 15s. Max 3 stacks. Causes Curses to deal additional damage based on Spell Power when they expire or 300% of this damage if the Curse is cleansed. Lasts 1h.

Deals 908 to 1003 Death damage, split equally among up to 3 enemies after 10s. Total damage is increased by 80% for each additional enemy hit. Triggers early if the enemy dies or is damaged by the Cleric's Tyranny of Death. Counts as an Obliteration ability. Requires Condensed Obliteration.
Deals 931 to 1030 Death damage after 10s. Triggers early if the enemy is damaged by the Cleric's Tyranny of Death. Counts as an Obliteration ability. Requires Focused Obliteration.
Resets the cooldown on all Sigils. Causes the next 3 Sigils to have no cooldown. Does not affect Sigil of Catastrophe. Lasts 1m.
Causes the next hostile spell cast on the ally to be reflected back at the caster. Lasts 10s.
Interrupts and Debilitates up to 10 enemies for 5s.
Deals 1048 to 1159 Death damage to up to 5 enemies. Restores 6% health and mana to the Cleric for each enemy hit. Counts as an Obliteration ability. Requires Condensed Obliteration.

Increases damage done by 3%. Increases all Resistances by 3%. Greatly increases the damage of Obliteration abilities and causes them to deal single target damage. Shares a cooldown with Condensed Obliteration and Unbounded Obliteration.
Deals 3066 Death damage over 15s. Counts as an Obliteration ability. Requires Focused Obliteration.
Deals 2299 Death damage over 15s. Can only affect 1 enemy. Counts as an Obliteration ability. Requires Focused Obliteration.
Removes 1 Buff from up to 10 enemies.
Applies Curse of Solitude for 15s. Deals 130 to 144 Death damage to up to 8 enemies every 1.5s. Can only affect 1 enemy. Counts as an Obliteration ability.

Increases damage done with area effect abilities by 3%. Increases all Resistances by 3%. Increases the damage of Obliteration abilities and causes them to affect up to 5 targets. Shares a cooldown with Focused Obliteration and Unbounded Obliteration.
Increases damage done with area effect abilities by 3%. Increases all Resistances by 3%. Shares a cooldown with Condensed Obliteration and Focused Obliteration.
Deals 568 to 628 Death damage, split equally among up to 5 enemies. Total damage is increased by 60% for each additional enemy hit. Counts as an Obliteration ability. Requires Condensed Obliteration.

Applies Curse of Anarchy to up to 5 enemies. Deals 2851 Death damage over 15s. Total damage is increased by 80% for each additional enemy affected. Can affect a maximum of 5 enemies at a time. Counts as an Obliteration ability. Requires Condensed Obliteration.
Deals 728 to 804 Death damage. Applies a stack of Darkness, dealing an additional 766 Death damage over 15s. Max 3 stacks.
Snares up to 10 enemies for 5s.
